text:
At Crop Diagnostix, we're
solving the farmer's number one

problem, understanding
plant health.

Farmers need to understand
plant health in order

to apply the right amount of
inputs to maximize crop yield.

But currently, farmers are
over applying chemical inputs

by 65%, which is not only
detrimental to the environment,
it's expensive for the farmer.

At Crop Diagnostix, we can
take a tiny leaf sample

and use AI and gene
expression biomarkers

to report plant health
from the earliest stages,

enabling farmers to optimize
their inputs and maximize yield.

And with every
farmer that we help

and every leaf sample
that we analyze,

we will build the largest
gene expression database
that agriculture has ever seen.

A database, an AI platform,
that will not only

revolutionize the way
we farm but the way

we breed new plant
varieties and the way

we manufacture new
chemical inputs.
My name is Brandon Chi.

My background is in chemical
engineering and venture capital.

And my family farms in
the Mississippi Delta
and in New York.

My cofounders are a PhD
plant biologist and a PhD AI
scientist.

We've already patented
five biomarkers,
won multiple grants and awards.

And we have a wait
list of customers
spanning over 3 million acres.
We're Crop Diagnostix.

Help us build the
future of agriculture.
Thank you.
[APPLAUSE]
